title: Jamelle Bouie: “Either democracy was on the ballot in November, or it...
content: Jamelle Bouie: “Either democracy was on the ballot in November, or it wasn’t, and if it was, it makes no political, ethical or strategic sense to act as if we live in normal times.” 100,000%!! This is driving me *nuts*. Dem pols: fight or piss off.
author: Jason Kottke
